allow: Bash(python3 -c "import sys,json; deps={**json.load\(sys.stdin\).get\(''dependencies'',{}\),**json.load\(open\(''package.json''\)\).get\(''devDependencies'',{}\)}; [print\(k,v\) for k,v in sorted\(deps.items\(\)\) if ''stripe'' in k.lower\(\) or ''payment'' in k.lower\(\) or ''card'' in k.lower\(\)]")
